hotels.title: Sky-High South China Hyatt Elegance with Infinity Pool, Onsite Dining & Spa
hotels.description: Towering above Guangzhou's CBD, Park Hyatt provides breathtaking views of Pearl River. This architectural masterpiece offers contemporary rooms, a stunning 60th-floor infinity pool and a world-class spa. Impeccable service meets exquisite design, creating an urban sanctuary for both business and leisure travellers amidst the city's dynamic energy. Strategically positioned in Zhujiang New Town, the hotel offers easy access to Guangzhou Opera House and premier shopping. Culinary excellence awaits at three signature restaurants and a rooftop bar, where chefs and mixologists transform local ingredients into artistic creations. After exploring nearby Canton Tower, return to your elegant haven high above the city.
